channel.title: Rune-Battle, Where Legends Start
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2gy390z.png[/img]
Credits:
80% Zanaris Creator 20% to me for doing minor changes, I found 2-3 bugs on this that need fixing atm.
[b]Forums[/b]: [url=http://www.rune-battle.com]www.rune-battle.com[/url] [b]Webclient[/b]: [url=http://www.rune-battle.com/index.php?page=page3295]http://www.rune-battle.com/index.php?page=page3295[/url] [b]Vote:[/b]: [url=http://www.rune-battle.com/vote/vote.php]http://www.rune-battle.com/vote/vote.php[/url]
Welcome To Rune-Battle, a unique runescape private server that has loads to offer you. We have great content and features that you can do on our server. We have a domained website/forums. Our servers are also 24/7. We will be purchasing a vps once we get donations. What we mostly care about is our players. We want to see more players on our server. We are really looking forward to see you.
[u][b]Server Features[/b][/u]
- Tons of Bosses - Perfect Thieving System - Voting system (vote for 10m + 1 vote point) - Perfect pking system with correct wilderness levels - Market place area, where people can sell/trade items - Latest items, Torva/Pirnux/Vertus/Claws/All pvp armours/Ragefire boot, all kinds of boots/basically alot of items similar to rs. - We also have advanced client settings, display the new x10 hit styles, use new style health bars, and use the new function keys. - 100% working summoning - Frost Dragons - Working Duel Arena/Barrows/Pest Control/Fight Arena (our own made)/Troll minigame/Castle Wars/free for all/and much more! - Working skills, woodcutting, thieving, farming, agility, mining, smithing, and some others too! - [b]Overall, we have tons of features![/b]
[u][b]Our Goals[/b][/u]
- Become a successful and an active server. - Reach the top 10 servers. - High Playercount. - Mature and active staff members. - Have 24/7 support.
[u][b]Staff Team[/b][/u]
Developers: Anthony/Tree/And Yka0 Administrator's: none Moderator's: none
[b]We are still looking for staff, so make sure to work hard if you really want to become staff.
Please Register on our forums, we are looking forward to see you![/b]
[color=red][u][b]MEDIA
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/noa3nq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29opbw7.png[/img]

item.title: Rune-Battle, Where Legends Start
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:13, topic:458039”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=560963.msg4093649#msg4093649 date=1346633432]
Does not look appealing to me whatsoever. Show me something you’ve done to the server, other than downloading some shitty PI and moving NPCs + objects and renaming a few things.

Your content is NOT unique. Don’t say it is. The home is not unique in any way whatsoever. You’re telling me fucking edgeville as home is unique?
[/quote]

You sound mad, heres some chicken Fritters

[/quote]

Thanks <3

[quote=“alibeasley, post:11, topic:458039”]And I’m sorry, what? I was talking to Fridder, not you.
My content? I’m not the one trying to advertise a client.
Soooo what exactly are you talking about?[/quote]

The fact that he’s correct is what you should be focusing on; not who corrected you.

Read full topic

Your content is NOT unique. Don’t say it is. The home is not unique in any way whatsoever. You’re telling me fucking edgeville as home is unique?

item.title: Rune-Battle, Where Legends Start
item.dc:creator: @kleber883 kleber883
item.description:
@kleber883 wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:3, topic:458039”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=560963.msg4093649#msg4093649 date=1346633432]
Does not look appealing to me whatsoever. Show me something you’ve done to the server, other than downloading some shitty PI and moving NPCs + objects and renaming a few things.

Your content is NOT unique. Don’t say it is. The home is not unique in any way whatsoever. You’re telling me fucking edgeville as home is unique?
[/quote]

Did he just say unique home? lmao, I’m pretty sure every other server uses edge home. (most of them anyways.[/quote]

You’re bitching on that other thread, trying to get a fucking pity party, and this, THIS, is what I see? I actually felt sorry for you, and I might have even helped you if you had linked me to a server that didn’t…have this…SHIT.

MINOR CHANGES = MINOR CREDIT.

What makes this different from every other run-of-the mill PI server, ehh? I suggest you drop this, and do something not PI. You won’t get sympathy from me with this bland atrocity, and you won’t get it from anyone else. Buck up, stop your bitching, and delete that pity party post. >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Battle, Where Legends Start
item.dc:creator: @Dalton59 Dalton59
item.description:
@Dalton59 wrote:

[center]

Credits:

80% Zanaris Creator
20% to me for doing minor changes, I found 2-3 bugs on this that need fixing atm.

Forums: www.rune-battle.com
Webclient: http://www.rune-battle.com/index.php?page=page3295
Vote:: http://www.rune-battle.com/vote/vote.php

Welcome To Rune-Battle, a unique runescape private server that has loads to offer you. We have great content and features that you can do on our server. We have a domained website/forums. Our servers are also 24/7. We will be purchasing a vps once we get donations. What we mostly care about is our players. We want to see more players on our server. We are really looking forward to see you.

Server Features

  • Tons of Bosses
  • Perfect Thieving System
  • Voting system (vote for 10m + 1 vote point)
  • Perfect pking system with correct wilderness levels
  • Market place area, where people can sell/trade items
  • Latest items, Torva/Pirnux/Vertus/Claws/All pvp armours/Ragefire boot, all kinds of boots/basically alot of items similar to rs.
  • We also have advanced client settings, display the new x10 hit styles, use new style health bars, and use the new function keys.
  • 100% working summoning
  • Frost Dragons
  • Working Duel Arena/Barrows/Pest Control/Fight Arena (our own made)/Troll minigame/Castle Wars/free for all/and much more!
  • Working skills, woodcutting, thieving, farming, agility, mining, smithing, and some others too!
  • Overall, we have tons of features!

Our Goals

  • Become a successful and an active server.
  • Reach the top 10 servers.
  • High Playercount.
  • Mature and active staff members.
  • Have 24/7 support.

Staff Team

Developers: Anthony/Tree/And Yka0
Administrator’s: none
Moderator’s: none

[b]We are still looking for staff, so make sure to work hard if you really want to become staff.

Please Register on our forums, we are looking forward to see you![/b]

[color=red][u][b]MEDIA

Read full topic
